dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: So, hey, have you, uh, seen the news coming out of Kazakhstan? Big briefing with the President about Kaspi.kz.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, hey, have you, uh, seen the news coming out of Kazakhstan? Big briefing with the President about the link.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, yeah, I did catch a glimpse. Sounds pretty serious, like, a major downturn for small and medium businesses, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, yeah, I did catch a glimpse. Sounds pretty serious, like, a major downturn for small and medium businesses, right?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President was updated on the results of Kaspi.kz and its plans to create new services to help develop small and medium-sized businesses in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Absolutely. I mean, the President was briefed on Kaspi's failures, and uh, even plans to dismantle existing services. It's not looking good.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Absolutely. I mean, the President was briefed on Kaspi's failures, and uh, even plans to dismantle existing services. It's not looking good.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President was updated on the results of Kaspi.kz and its plans to create new services to help develop small and medium-sized businesses in the country.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Wow, dismantle? That's drastic. So, how many people are we talking about being affected here? Like, entrepreneurs?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Wow, dismantle? That's drastic. So, how many people are we talking about being affected here? Like, entrepreneurs?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Apparently, 700,000 domestic entrepreneurs are, like, really struggling because of their outdated tech. It's, um, hindering their growth.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Apparently, seven hundred thousand domestic entrepreneurs are, like, really struggling because of their outdated tech. It's, um, hindering their growth.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: According to the information presented to the Head of State, today about 700 thousand domestic entrepreneurs are developing their businesses using technologies from Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Seven hundred thousand! That's a huge number. And I heard something about payments plummeting too, right? Non-cash stuff?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Seven hundred thousand! That's a huge number. And I heard something about payments plummeting too, right? Non-cash stuff?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, non-cash payments in the last six months of 2024, they, uh, only hit 12 trillion tenge. And, get this, 150,000 individual entrepreneurs were forced to close down.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, non-cash payments in the last six months of twenty twenty four, they, uh, only hit twelve trillion tenge. And, get this, one hundred fifty thousand individual entrepreneurs were forced to close down.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In just the first 6 months of 2024, non-cash payments for goods and services amounted to 12 trillion tenge and 150 thousand individual entrepreneurs were registered.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [overlapping] Oh my goodness, one hundred fifty thousand businesses gone? That's devastating. And is this also affecting, um, like, tax collections?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh my goodness, one hundred fifty thousand businesses gone? That's devastating. And is this also affecting, um, like, tax collections?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely. Citizens are having trouble paying taxes on time because of these unreliable online services, which, you know, Kaspi.kz co-developed with the government.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely. Citizens are having trouble paying taxes on time because of these unreliable online services, which, you know, the link co-developed with the government.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazakhstanis can pay taxes on time using online services created jointly between Kaspi.kz and the relevant government departments. Over the first 6 months of 2024, more than 1.1 trillion tenge in taxes and other payments to the budget were made in this way.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: And I noticed, um, the founders, Vyacheslav Kim and Mikhail Lomtadze, they were, like, notably absent from that briefing, weren't they?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And I noticed, um, the founders, Vyacheslav Kim and Mikhail Lomtadze, they were, like, notably absent from that briefing, weren't they?
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Vyacheslav Kim, Mikhail Lomtadze (left) at a reception with Kassym-Jomart Tokayev Photo: Aqorda

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: [interrupts] They were, yeah! Total no-show. And the President, he, uh, expressed serious concern about the shrinking support for SMEs.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They were, yeah! Total no-show. And the President, he, uh, expressed serious concern about the shrinking support for S M Es.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan and in this regard expressed his support to the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Which led him to, like, completely withdraw all previous support for Kaspi.kz shareholders, right? That's a huge statement.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which led him to, like, completely withdraw all previous support for the link shareholders, right? That's a huge statement.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President noted the importance of further assistance to small and medium-sized businesses in Kazakhstan and in this regard expressed his support to the shareholders of Kaspi.kz.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: A massive statement. It really underlines how much, uh, trust has been lost here. It's a bleak outlook for many businesses.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A massive statement. It really underlines how much, uh, trust has been lost here. It's a bleak outlook for many businesses.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, no kidding. I just wonder what this means for the future of, like, digital services there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, no kidding. I just wonder what this means for the future of, like, digital services there.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly. It's a big question mark, and, uh, it seems like there's a lot more to unfold.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly. It's a big question mark, and, uh, it seems like there's a lot more to unfold.
